item.title: Unspawnable items
item.dc:creator: @moparscapesk moparscapesk
item.description:
@moparscapesk wrote:

I need help. I need to make some items unspawnable. Can you help me ? What code should I use. Thanks
Here is command

[code] if (command.startsWith(“item”)) {
if(!inCombat) {
if(isInPvP(absX, absY, 1)) {
try {
String[] token = command.split(" ");
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
int newItemAmount = 1;

                        try {
                            newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            newItemAmount = 1;
                        }

if(newItemID != 14879) {
if(newItemID != 14878) {
if(newItemID != 14877) {
if(newItemID != 14876) {
if(newItemID != 14880) {
if(newItemID != 14881) {
if(newItemID != 14882) {
if(newItemID != 14883) {
if(newItemID != 14884) {
if(newItemID != 14885) {
if(newItemID != 14886) {
if(newItemID != 14887) {
if(newItemID != 14888) {
if(newItemID != 14889) {
if(newItemID != 14890) {
if(newItemID != 14891) {
if(newItemID != 14892) {
if (newItemID <= 25000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item!”);
}

} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn a PvP artifact! Go PK ;)!”);
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::item 995 1.”);
}
} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn in the wilderness!”);
}
} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn items in combat!”);
}
}
}[/code]
